name: Apple
desc: A small beginning for a journey, may this be the answer.

name: Coal
desc: Used as fuel and as a primitive writing utensil.

name: Wood
desc: The sons and daughters of the praisers of the sun.

name: Watermelon
desc: Huge fruit, wish I had a juice-shooting dinosaur with me.

name: AppleFace
desc: Are you really gonna eat it??.

name: AppleGolden
desc: This was touched by Midas, now its my turn.

name: AppleGreen
desc: Same as its brother but... greener.

name: AppleCloud
desc: Like being touched by the angels... in a good and healthy way.

name: AppleRainbow
desc: What if i eat 2? will I see a double rainbow?.

name: Squidward
desc: The most beautiful being in all of existance.
